Texts.Chs: 相对于新星堡而言，这里比那里大多了，就是墙比那里差了一点儿。
Texts.Eng: Fort Nova's not very large, but some walls are better than none.

Texts.Chs: 鹰眼的手下已经在矿山中埋设了各式各样的陷阱，从那时起就再也没有人能活着离开那里了。
Texts.Eng: Hank's men have dug themselves into the hillside, set down all kinds of traps. Now no one's crossing that there hill...

Texts.Chs: 在你离开之前，请去喝几杯吧！你可以在路上找到酒吧。
Texts.Eng: Have a drink at our saloon before you leave. Get one in you for the road.

Texts.Chs: 鹰眼是个好人，可惜他生错时代了。
Texts.Eng: Hawkeye Hank was a good man, but lean times turn good men bad.

Texts.Chs: 鹰眼一直在阻拦我们运矿石出去！
Texts.Eng: Hawkeye Hank's been terrorising the roads. We can't get our ore shipped out!

Texts.Chs: 鹰眼的手下完全是一群丑恶的暴徒。
Texts.Eng: Hawkeye Hank's men are a bunch of ugly thugs.
Howdy, pardner! Are you new to Fort Nova?

Texts.Chs: 迄今为止还没有人能从鹰眼那里平安回来，我们不希望你和他们一样。
Texts.Eng: No one we've sent after Hawkeye Hank has returned...hopefully you won't meet the same fate.

Texts.Chs: 螺丝矿山里面充满了大量的贵金属，但是鹰眼一开始真正想要寻找的是钻石，而如今，他想要的是全部。
Texts.Eng: The Screwbolt Mine's full of silver, but what really got Hank and his gang going was the miners striking diamonds. Now they want it all to themselves.

Texts.Chs: 鹰眼，无论死活，赏金两千，或许我该去把这个赏金给领了。
Texts.Eng: Two thousand for Hawkeye Hank, dead or alive. If I had more confidence in my abilities, I'd go for the bounty myself.

Texts.Chs: 我们才不服务你这种...慢着，我们会按照你说的做，忘记了刚才说的。
Texts.Eng: We don't serve your kind here...oh wait, we do. Forget I said anything.

Texts.Chs: 我们曾经在这里经营着矿场，直到鹰眼把它给毁了，现在让我们这些老实人该何去何从？
Texts.Eng: We used to have a good mine here... until Hawkeye's men ruined it. Now how's a honest fellow to do any work?

Texts.Chs: 我们离边境很远，你或许可以从酒吧的厨师那里买一些食粮。
Texts.Eng: We're pretty far out along the frontier. You might want to buy some trail rations from the chef in the saloon.

Texts.Chs: 你想询问关于赏金的事？那么就先去和警长聊聊吧。
Texts.Eng: You here 'bout the bounty? You should check in with the sheriff first.

Texts.Chs: 在和警长对话之前你可以在附近随便走走。
Texts.Eng: You oughta check in with the sheriff before heading out anywhere, pardner.
